New Records: Evin Lewis scored 102 runs, the highest score in the match
Wanindu Hasaranga took 6 wickets and had the best bowling figure of 4/40
Key Match Events: Evin Lewis' century turned the match in West Indies' favor
Rain interrupted play, reducing the game to 22 overs per side
Pre-Game Insights: The match was played on 'Pink Ribbon Day'
Experts predicted a close contest given the teams' performances in the series
Post-Match Reflections: Sammy labeled the loss as a'moral victory', acknowledging Sri Lanka's dominance
Sri Lanka won the series 2-1, a significant achievement
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was part of the West Indies tour of Sri Lanka
Sri Lanka's victory marked their first series win against the West Indies since 2013
Others: The series win was a crucial milestone for Sri Lanka ahead of upcoming tournaments
